data.name: Colum and His Friends
data.detailed_description:
After 4 decades of the studio sitting in the darkness. You hear that the place will get demolished, as a past artist over there you decide to wonder inside the studio, archive a couple things, and maybe learn a new thing or two from some old friends.

Check back later.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
